mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, IFNULL(b.click_count, 0) clickCount, IFNULL(b.like_count, 0) likeCount, IFNULL(b.comment_count, 0) commentCount, IFNULL(b.collect_count, 0) collectCount, u.id authorId, u.nick_name authorName, b.create_time createTime, CASE WHEN l.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END liked, CASE WHEN c.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END collected FROM t_article b LEFT JOIN t_user u ON b.author = u.id LEFT JOIN t_like l ON l.type = 1 AND b.id = l.obj_id AND l.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_collect c ON c.article_id = b.id AND c.user_id = #{userId} WHERE b.status = 1 AND b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_article set like_count = COALESCE(like_count, 0) + #{count} where id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select like_count from t_article where id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: update t_article set comment_count = COALESCE(comment_count, 0) + #{count} where id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select COALESCE(comment_count, 0) from t_article where id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: update t_article set click_count = COALESCE(click_count, 0) + #{count} where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set collect_count = COALESCE(collect_count, 0) + #{count} where id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.pic_id picId, COALESCE(b.click_count, 0) clickCount, COALESCE(b.like_count, 0) likeCount, COALESCE(b.collect_count, 0) collectCount, u.id authorId, u.nick_name authorName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) tagNameList FROM t_article b LEFT JOIN t_user u ON b.author = u.id LEFT JOIN t_article_tag bt ON b.id = bt.article_id AND bt.status = 1 LEFT JOIN t_tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id AND t.status = 1 WHERE b.status = 1 AND b.id = #{articleId}

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.pic_id picId, u.id authorId, u.nick_name authorName FROM t_article b LEFT JOIN t_user u ON b.author = u.id WHERE b.status = 1 AND b.title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
limit 10 OFFSET #{page}

SELECT id, title FROM t_article b WHERE b.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY COALESCE ( b.click_count, 0 ) * 0.1 + COALESCE ( b.like_count, 0 ) * 0.3 + COALESCE ( b.comment_count, 0 ) * 0.2 + COALESCE ( b.collect_count, 0 ) * 0.4 DESC LIMIT 10
